{{doomwiki}} An '''artifact''' is any [[inventory]] [[actor]] which is not automatically used when picked up and therefore remains in the player's inventory, where it can be used when wanted. [[Heretic]], [[Hexen]] and [[Strife]] all feature a selection of artifacts, whereas [[Doom]] and the other games do not; though mods can use artifacts in any game.
The artifact's {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} must be defined as it is what will be used to identify it in the inventory bar of the [[HUD]]. In the default Doom [[status bar]], if artifacts are available, the [[mugshot]] is overridden by a display of the currently selected artifact. The [[customize controls#Inventory|"item"]] functions ("next item", "previous item", "activate item", "drop item", etc.) all affect the currently selected artifact.
An artifact should also have a {{Property|Tag}} defined so as to allow the [[HUD options#Display_nametags|display nametags]] option to work optimally when it is set to "inventory" or "both".
The <tt>give artifacts</tt> [[console command]] will give all defined artifacts to the player. [[Category:Glossary]]
